alert.note: Alert for Camden; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CAMDEN...CENTRAL PASQUOTANK AND NORTH CENTRAL PERQUIMANS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chapanoke, or 7 miles west of Elizabeth City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elizabeth City around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Burnt Mills, Pasquotank, Rabbit Corner, Pierceville, Parkville, Woodville, Nicanor, Spences Corner, Lambs Corner, and Johnsons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
